Body:
doc = make_doc(['two words', 'three fucking words', 'another three words'],
    None, [False, False, False])
filtr = SimpleBlockFusionProcessor()
is_changed = filtr.process(doc)
block_idxs = [(block.offset_blocks_start, block.offset_blocks_end) for
    block in doc.text_blocks]
assert block_idxs == [(0, 0), (1, 2)]
assert is_changed is True
